text:
I wanted to go in an economic university, nonetheless my family could not afford the tuition fees, so I searched for an other way to learn how to manage a team. I really enjoy to manage a team, because I was a handball trainer for my little brother during two years. It was pleasing to see all the team progress and work hard together in order to win matches. Nevertheless, due to the tuition fees, I searched for an engineering school. I loved and had very good marks in physical chemistry and mathematics, particularly cryptography. Furthermore, I found out ESIR on internet and I saw that we could follow lesson of managing skill in double diploma MAE with IGR, so I applied to ESIR, and I was recruited since I am a girl. Nevertheless, I just found out that we can't go on this path due to the difficulty to schedule lessons at different times. The two schools didn't find a way to make it work, so I don't really have the choice to change plans.
Hopefully, during the summer I realized an internship with one of my ancient teacher and I help her to teach four classes. I really loved this time in class and at home when I was preparing lessons. It was the first time since first year in ESIR where I was happy to work. My mathematic teacher, Miss Alex Dupont is really inspiring, and I learned a lot of things thanks to the internship. Students were very happy to have a young person helping them to understand lessons better. I received a big amount of love and grating from them. It was adorable from them.
As an outcome, I want to try to be an engineer since I spent a lot of time studying to be one nonetheless, if it doesn't please me enough I will be a teacher since it is my heart choice.
